Class Natural

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Number
org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.integers.Natural
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Natural>, AbelianMonoid<Natural>, Magma<Natural>, Monoid<Natural>, Semiring<Natural>, Set<Natural>
public abstract class Natural extends Number implements Semiring<Natural>, Comparable<Natural>
Abstract base class for natural numbers (ℕ = {0, 1, 2, ...}).

Natural numbers form a semiring under addition and multiplication. This class provides a smart factory that automatically chooses the most efficient backing implementation:

  • Small values (≤ 2³¹-1): Uses int for maximum performance
  • Medium values (≤ 2⁶³-1): Uses long for good performance
  • Large values (> 2⁶³-1): Uses BigInteger for arbitrary precision

Usage


// Smart factory chooses optimal backing
Natural small = Natural.of(100); // Uses int internally
Natural large = Natural.of(1_000_000_000_000L); // Uses long
Natural huge = Natural.of(new BigInteger("999999999999999999999")); // Uses BigInteger
* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
